reasoning: Reporting incidence at ~0.15 per 100k person-years. Acute promyelocytic leukemia (APL) represents 10-15% of AML cases. Global AML incidence ~1-1.5 per 100k, making APL ~0.1-0.2 per 100k based on cancer registry data.
source: Lehmann S et al. (2011). Continuing improvement in survival in acute promyelocytic leukemia. Blood. 118(11):e1-9
